meta.name: Payload CMS - Complete Content Marketing Platform
meta.description: Full-featured Payload CMS with blog, marketing content, SEO, forms, analytics, and content operations
meta.interview_summary: Production-ready content marketing CMS built on Payload. Includes: marketing page content (FAQs, Pricing, Testimonials, Features), full blog platform (Articles, Authors, Categories, Tags), SEO infrastructure (structured data, meta fields, sitemaps), engagement features (forms, newsletter, search), content operations (versions, drafts, scheduling, analytics), and browser-verifiable acceptance criteria for all features.
